wordpressPost.title: Øyanatt på Revolver med Ida Engelhardt, FAKETHIAS og Onleash
wordpressPost.excerpt: Heftig trekløver på Revolver etter at parken stenger fredag 9. august.
wordpressPost.content:
Ida Engelhardt (DK) – FAKETHIAS – Onleash
Friday 9. august
Revolver, Oslo

Doors: 23.00-03.00
Price: 100 / 120 kr (med/uten pass)

IDA ENGELHARDT (DK, Fast Forward)
The true don of the Copenhagen fast techno scene, Ida Engelhardt represents some of the city’s most exciting collectives right now, favouring a style that is euphoric, yet 100% face- melting. As a part of the Fast Forward collective she melds hard techno, hard trance and hardcore into one of the fastest and most cathartic styles in the scene. Ida’s DJ-sets have a demonic energy and an angelic heart. She has previously played at Berghain, Norberg Festival and is booked to play Roskilde Festival this summer to name a few. We can’t wait to hear Ida break every speed limit in the club.
soundcloud.com/ida-engelhardt

FAKETHIAS, DJ-sett
Oslo-based artist FAKETHIAS makes restless and disjointed electronic music. He searches for harmony in the chaotic and relentless, whilst delving into an array of extremes and contrasts, fusing industrial textures with contemplative melodies and personal voice notes. His debut EP Attune, released on Oslo-label Ball Em Up in 2018 got him nominated for Spellemannsprisen, the Norwegian equivalent to a Grammy. He was selected as one of the few applicants to attend Red Bull Music Academy in its final year. This summer he’ll bring his intense and playful DJ sets and live performances to festivals such as Sónar Barcelona and Øya.
soundcloud.com/fakethias

ONLEASH
Onleash is the latest project from the Oslo-based artist, Drippin. His new taurine fueled direction marks a new beginning for the producer who is globally recognised for his hard- hitting drums and peak time club ballads. Onleash, in contrast to Drippin, embodies hyper- techno through the genre’s core values like kicks to the groin paralleled with the aftermath of too much dodgy pre-workout powder.
soundcloud.com/onleash

OM ØYANATT: Øyanatt er konserter og klubbkonsepter rundt omkring i Oslo sentrum etter at Tøyenparken stenger 23.00. Dette er altså en glimrende mulighet til å ta med seg den gode festivalstemninga inn i byen etterpå. Øyanatt lages i samarbeid med de beste arrangørene og klubbene i Oslo. Grunnet varierende forutsetninger og behovet for at arrangørene skal få disse konsertene/klubbkonseptene til å gå rundt på egenhånd, gjør det ikke mulig å inkludere Øyanatt i festivalpasset. Gyldig Øya-billett til den aktuelle dagen (evt ukespass) gir rabatt på Øyanatt-arrangement.
